attributes.action: put pressure on Barclays / First Plus to reduce their variable loan rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
First Plus secured loans (part of Barclays) are offered on a variable rate basis.  However, First Plus have so far refused to reduce any of their loan rates.

We would ask the prime minister to put pressure on this istitution to "play fair" and pass on rate reduction which reflects the current market conditions.

rejection.details: There are already several petitions live on the system on the topci of lortgage and loan rates. Please search for one you would like to sign.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
